item.title: Green Room - Red Band Trailer 2
item.cidm:synopsis150: A young punk rock band find themselves trapped in a secluded venue after stumbling upon a horrific act of violence.
item.cidm:synopsis250: A young punk rock band find themselves trapped in a secluded venue after stumbling upon a horrific act of violence.
item.cidm:synopsis500: A young punk rock band find themselves trapped in a secluded venue after stumbling upon a horrific act of violence.
item.cidm:cast: Patrick Stewart, Anton Yelchin, Alia Shawkat

item.title: The Bye Bye Man - Trailer
item.cidm:synopsis150: When three college students move into an old house off campus, they unwittingly unleash a supernatural entity known as The Bye Bye Man.
item.cidm:synopsis250: When three college students move into an old house off campus, they unwittingly unleash a supernatural entity known as The Bye Bye Man, who comes to prey upon them once they discover his name.
item.cidm:synopsis500: When three college students move into an old house off campus, they unwittingly unleash a supernatural entity known as The Bye Bye Man, who comes to prey upon them once they discover his name. The friends must try to save each other, all the while keeping The Bye Bye Man's existence a secret to save others from the same deadly fate.
item.cidm:cast: Douglas Smith, Faye Dunaway, Carrie-Anne Moss

item.title: Death Valley: The Revenge of Bloody Bill
item.cidm:synopsis150: A killer returns from the grave to lead an army of zombies against a drug dealer and a group of high-schoolers.
item.cidm:synopsis250: A killer returns from the grave to lead an army of zombies against a drug dealer and a group of high-schoolers.
item.cidm:synopsis500: A killer returns from the grave to lead an army of zombies against a drug dealer and a group of high-schoolers.
item.cidm:cast: Chelsea Jean, Denise Boutte, Jeremy Bouvet

item.title: My Morphing Life - Season Three
item.cidm:synopsis150: Follow Jason David Frank, the most famous Power Ranger of all time.
item.cidm:synopsis250: Follow Jason David Frank, the most famous Power Ranger of all time.
item.cidm:synopsis500: Follow Jason David Frank, the most famous Power Ranger of all time.
item.cidm:cast: David Yost, Jason David, Johnny Yong, Tammie Frank

item.title: The BFG - Trailer
item.cidm:synopsis150: A girl named Sophie encounters the Big Friendly Giant who, despite his intimidating appearance, turns out to be a kindhearted soul.
item.cidm:synopsis250: A girl named Sophie encounters the Big Friendly Giant who, despite his intimidating appearance, turns out to be a kindhearted soul who is considered an outcast by the other giants because unlike his peers refuses to eat boys and girls.
item.cidm:synopsis500: A girl named Sophie encounters the Big Friendly Giant who, despite his intimidating appearance, turns out to be a kindhearted soul who is considered an outcast by the other giants because unlike his peers refuses to eat boys and girls.
item.cidm:cast: Rebecca Hall, Mark Rylance, Bill Hader

item.title: Kill Zone 2 - Trailer
item.cidm:synopsis150: When an undercover cop gets too close to revealing the mastermind of a drug syndicate, his cover is blown.
item.cidm:synopsis250: When an undercover cop gets too close to revealing the mastermind of a drug syndicate, his cover is blown.
item.cidm:synopsis500: When an undercover cop gets too close to revealing the mastermind of a drug syndicate, his cover is blown. Double-crossed and under a false identity, he's thrown into a Thai prison, where a guard discovers the inmate—claiming he's a cop—is a bone marrow match for his dying daughter... and his warden may have an even deadlier operation hidden within the prison walls
item.cidm:cast: Tony Jaa, Jing Wu, Simon Yam

item.title: Swiss Army Man - Trailer
item.cidm:synopsis150: A hopeless man stranded in the wilderness befriends a dead body and together they go on a surreal journey to get home.
item.cidm:synopsis250: A hopeless man stranded in the wilderness befriends a dead body and together they go on a surreal journey to get home.
item.cidm:synopsis500: A hopeless man stranded in the wilderness befriends a dead body and together they go on a surreal journey to get home.
item.cidm:cast: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Daniel Radcliffe, Paul Dano

item.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - Trailer
item.cidm:synopsis150: Rogue One, which takes place before the events of Star Wars: A New Hope, tells the story of unlikely heroes who have united to steal plans to the dreaded Death Star.
item.cidm:synopsis250: Lucasfilm’s Rogue One, which takes place before the events of Star Wars: A New Hope, tells the story of unlikely heroes who have united to steal plans to the dreaded Death Star.
item.cidm:synopsis500: Lucasfilm’s Rogue One, which takes place before the events of Star Wars: A New Hope, tells the story of unlikely heroes who have united to steal plans to the dreaded Death Star.
item.cidm:cast: Felicity Jones, Mads Mikkelsen, Alan Tudyk

item.title: Paranormal Entity

item.title: The Shallows - Trailer
item.cidm:synopsis150: When Mia is attacked by a great white shark while surfing alone, she is stranded just a short distance from shore and getting there will prove to be a contest of wills
item.cidm:synopsis250: When Mia (Blake Lively) is attacked by a great white shark while surfing alone, she is stranded just a short distance from shore. Though she is only 200 yards from her survival, getting there proves the ultimate contest of wills.
